snippet: Statements made by Yoselyn Ortega, who has pleaded not guilty to fatally stabbing two children in their Upper West Side apartment in 2012, were made public in court filings.
abstract: Yoselyn Ortega, nanny accused of killing 6-year-old Lucia Krim and 2-year-old Leo Krim in their Upper West Side apartment in 2012, says in court papers that she is sorry for what she had done, despite having pleaded not guilty to charges.
lead_paragraph: Statements made by Yoselyn Ortega, who has pleaded not guilty to fatally stabbing two children in their Upper West Side apartment in 2012, were made public in court filings.

headline.main: Nanny Expressed Regret Over 2 Killings, Papers Show
headline.print_headline: Nanny Expressed Regret Over 2 Killings, Papers Show
